content:
IObjectSet<TEntity> Interface

Definition

Provides functionality to allow making modifications to a set of data objects.

In this Article

public interface IObjectSet<TEntity> : System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TEntity>, System.Linq.IQueryable<TEntity> where TEntity : class

Type Parameters

TEntity

The type of an entity object returned from the query.

Methods

AddObject(TEntity)

Notifies the set that an object that represents a new entity must be added to the set.

public void AddObject (TEntity entity);
entity
TEntity

The new object to add to the set.

Remarks

Changes to the set may not be visible in an enumeration of the set until changes to that set have been persisted in some manner. This behavior depends on the specific implementation of the IObjectSet<TEntity>.

Attach(TEntity)

Notifies the set that an object that represents an existing entity must be added to the set.

public void Attach (TEntity entity);
entity
TEntity

The existing object to add to the set.

Remarks

Changes to the set may not be visible in an enumeration of the set until changes to that set have been persisted in some manner. This behavior depends on the specific implementation of the IObjectSet<TEntity>.

DeleteObject(TEntity)

Notifies the set that an object that represents an existing entity must be deleted from the set.

public void DeleteObject (TEntity entity);
entity
TEntity

The existing object to delete from the set.

Remarks

Changes to the set may not be visible in an enumeration of the set until changes to that set have been persisted in some manner. This behavior depends on the specific implementation of the IObjectSet<TEntity>.

Detach(TEntity)

Notifies the set that an object that represents an existing entity must be detached from the set.

public void Detach (TEntity entity);
entity
TEntity

The object to detach from the set.

Remarks

Changes to the set may not be visible in an enumeration of the set until changes to that set have been persisted in some manner. This behavior depends on the specific implementation of the IObjectSet<TEntity>.
